name: âœ¨ Explore TreeListy
description: Welcome! This tree teaches you TreeListy by example. Try both Tree View and Canvas View - they show the same content!

children.name: ğŸ” Discover
children.subtitle: Learn the basics
children.description: Start here to understand how TreeListy organizes information

items.name: ğŸ‘ï¸ Two Views, One Tree
items.description: Toggle between Tree View (structured list) and Canvas View (visual map) using the buttons in the header. Both show the same data!

subItems.name: ğŸ“‹ Tree View: Organized list with expand/collapse
subItems.description: Click arrows to expand/collapse. Great for detailed editing.

subItems.name: ğŸ¨ Canvas View: Visual map with drag & drop
subItems.description: Drag nodes to arrange. Scroll to zoom. See connections visually.

items.name: ğŸ“‚ Infinite Hierarchy
items.description: Phases contain Items, Items contain Subtasks, Subtasks can nest infinitely deep. Right-click to add children anywhere!

children.name: ğŸ› ï¸ Create
children.subtitle: Build your ideas
children.description: Multiple ways to add content - manual or AI-powered

items.name: âœï¸ Manual Editing
items.description: Right-click any node for options: Add, Edit, Delete, Duplicate. Or use the + buttons.

items.name: ğŸ¤– AI Chat Builder
items.description: Click "Chat Builder" in sidebar. Describe your project in plain English - AI builds the tree structure for you!

items.name: ğŸ“¥ Import Text
items.description: Click "Import Text" in sidebar. Paste any document, notes, or outline - AI extracts structure automatically!

children.name: âœ¨ Enhance
children.subtitle: AI superpowers
children.description: Let AI help you think deeper and fill in details

items.name: ğŸ’¡ Smart Suggest
items.description: Right-click any field â†’ "AI Suggest" â†’ AI improves your text with domain expertise!

items.name: ğŸŒ± Smart Expand
items.description: Click "Smart Expand" in sidebar - AI adds subtasks, fills descriptions, and enriches your tree!

items.name: ğŸ©º Quality Check
items.description: Click "Check Quality" - AI reviews your tree for gaps, inconsistencies, and missing dependencies!

children.name: ğŸš€ Share
children.subtitle: Collaborate & export
children.description: Share your work with others or export for use elsewhere

items.name: ğŸ”— Share via URL
items.description: Click "Share" button â†’ Copy link â†’ Anyone can open your exact tree instantly, no account needed!

items.name: ğŸ¤ Collaborate
items.description: Right-click a node â†’ "Share for collaboration" â†’ Send branch to teammate â†’ They edit â†’ You merge changes back!

items.name: ğŸ’¾ Save & Load
items.description: File menu: Save as JSON to keep your work. Load it anytime. Also auto-saves to browser storage!
